website_summaries.verdict: The Ricoh Theta SC camera offers a stills-first approach to 360-degree capture, bucking the trend of competing devices geared more toward video.

customer_reviews.title: If you cant afford the better one, save up until you can
customer_reviews.text: The RICOH theta V is much much better.. you would be better to save your money and buy it instead. This is low entry level kit. If you just want to try it out, get one of these although it will not give the best impression about what you can expect from a 360 camera like the Theta V. SAVE FOR THE V!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Barry Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good start!
customer_reviews.text: I am trying a 360° camera for the first time. My initial impression is that it is very easy to set up and use. The images are good. I am still trying to figure out how to do certain things! I was annoyed that every photo had my hands in it. I have therefore had to order a stick, which is arriving tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Taher

customer_reviews.title: great fun
customer_reviews.text: easy to setup and use, however, be careful it is not stable as I would like and therefore I would recommend you always leave it on a tripod. if it falls over the first thing it will land on is one of the lenses a very expensive mistake....
customer_reviews.author: nig3l

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transfer images and video and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use camera, ideal for the first time buyer or user. Easy to transfer images and video and excellent quality. App is excellent and intuitive
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Very good toy, but the picture quality is a little bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Very good toy, but the picture quality is a little bit disappointing. It needs plenty of light and good conditions. But for this money it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: tomktom

customer_reviews.title: Can't be charged other than a PC!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can only charge the camera via a PC, really? What a design flaw and will be going straight back for a refund. What a load of rubbish....
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.text: Amazing To view 360 videos and pics,easy to use,great gadget to use on beach,or a great landscape,otherwise pointless (personal opinion)
customer_reviews.author: mdj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low-cost 360 degree survey solution
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the results of this inexpensive gadget - it gives reasonable image quality considering the device and lens size, is small enough to keep in your pocket and fast to use. Ideal when you need to survey with limited time available. Best gadget I've bought for some time!
customer_reviews.author: Alan T

customer_reviews.title: Utter rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Complete and utter rubbish. Do not buy. App does not work. Camera says it is connected, the app does not agree, therefore unusable. Stuck going round in circles for 4 hours plus, not fit for purpose. No support. Read the internet forums, dont take my word for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike de Graaf

customer_reviews.title: Get everyone in a pic with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and to connect to app. Great pics, just need to get a stand for it so that my thumb isn't always in the pic, friends loved it
customer_reviews.author: amy beswick

customer_reviews.title: Does what you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed product. Performance as expected. Picture quality is ok but not amaizing when zoomed in.
customer_reviews.author: Lee the gardener

customer_reviews.title: Think pink
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the colour it's not on your photo anyway so why pay more! Great gadget and handy size.
customer_reviews.author: ushiec

customer_reviews.title: Big thumbs  up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a 360 camera for my business and it’s been absolutely perfect easy to use easy to set up (If you have a Masters degree in technology LOL) but once it’s set up very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Andrew herbert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It is just amazing. The battery lasts ages. The photos are so cool. Would really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gilman

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise a good entry level 360 Camera
customer_reviews.text: Does everything a 360 camera in this price range should. Software occasionally a little buggy on Android, but otherwise a good entry level 360 Camera.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan P

customer_reviews.title: Good images, poor video
customer_reviews.text: Still images come out well and in decent resolution. Video quality is poor. Easy to use and works well with a tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great fun! Useful for pros or as a toy
customer_reviews.text: Great little point and shoot for family occasions or scouting out that perfect scene or just taking fun images
customer_reviews.author: sion p

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant 360 camera
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful 360 Camera, easy to use and upload to my device. Looking forward to finding a tripod so that my head and hand aren't in the shots. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cellrone

customer_reviews.title: 360 camera
customer_reviews.text: I love mine an the reaction to my photos its brill real easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: K
customer_reviews.text: I cannot return this product by product code label. Please arrange a normal process for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin, it works good quality item not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stills are fantastic, video is not so great but for the price I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A J Garden

customer_reviews.title: It's the devils work I tell you!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gadget. Just stunningly good fun for holiday and group photographs. No idea how it does it so well, but it does. One of my fave gadget purchases of the last year.
customer_reviews.author: Got A Ukulele

customer_reviews.title: recipient is happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present, recipient is happy with it. Good quality photos.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really easy to use camera for taking fantastic 360 degree images. You use the device in conjunction with the Ricoh Theta apps (free to download and available for both android and iOs.) The app allows you to view your images and you can share them via social. You can also use the images you create with VR headsets - they look really cool. Fantastic camera for creating impactful 360 images.
customer_reviews.author: Youdontownme

product_meta.title: Ricoh Theta SC 360 Degree Camera - Blue
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlueDeveloped as a standard-class model of the series, the new RICOH THETA SC provides casual, effortless enjoyment of 360-degree imaging, and also signifies the arrival of a new era of virtual reality. While retaining the high level of image quality provided by the RICOH THETA S using a high-performance CMOS image sensor and large-aperture lens, this mid-class model is designed to be lighter in weight than previous models. The RICOH THETA SC allows users to easily transfer captured 360-degree images to smartphones and tablet computers. It also lets them upload their images to the theta360.com dedicated website and then share them on social networks, or upload 360-degree videos directly to Facebook and YouTube. The RICOH THETA SC also offers a choice of four body colours (blue, beige, pink and white), making it your personalized imaging tool, one to enjoy every day, everywhere.

BOX CONTAINS
Ricoh Theta SC;Soft Case;USB Cable
feature_bullets: High quality 360 degree images in a single shot
Record 360 degree video in full HD (30fps, 5 mins). Object distance : Approx. 10cm - ∞ (from front of lens)
Compatible with most iOSand Android smart devices
Built in WIFI for easy transfer of images & video

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars412 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
